title: New: Blackbird Blackbird – Waikiki
body:
Ahead of his forthcoming EU tour, sunwave wonderkid **Mikey Maramag** has dropped a new track in the form of the wonderfully tropical _Waikiki_.

Embodying everything that’s great about **Blackbird Blackbird**, from the vibrant synths to wistful vocals, it may just be his finest work to date. Check out _Waikiki_ below and grab a free download.

###### 04/05 – ROU, Bucharest – TBA  
05/05 – TUR, Istanbul – TBA  
07/05 – FRA, Paris – Escape B  
08/05 – FRA, Lyon – Sonic

17/05 – GBR, London – Hoxton Bar & Kitchen

20/05 – POL, Krakow – Rozrywki 3

31/05 – SWE, Göteborg – Jazzhuset
